Question.Subject: Can Someone Guide me through this?
Question.Content:
http://www.widgetbox.com/make/
using that site im trying to make a
Contact Box For my website
like With button links that will take people to my myspace page and my facebook page and my twitter and all of that etc
can someone provide me steps on how to do this im comfused on how to do this
Question.ChosenAnswer:
You would be far better off using a site like 123 contactform Its free and very reliable. You can customize it to match your website colours and to add it to your site or web page is a simple copy and paste of the provided code.
http://www.123contactform.com/
Widget box also has contact forms already made for you. just register and add your details.
http://www.widgetbox.com/widget/thunderbird-contact-form
123contactform is far better than widgetbox in my opinion.
